March 23, 2018

Via Email

Darren K. Indyke, Esq.

Darren K Indyke, PLLC

575 Lexington Avenue- 4" floor
New York, NY 10022

Re: Jeffrey Epstein
Dear Mr. Indyke:

As you are aware, our firm represents TowersInvestors.com, Inc and Mr. Steven
Hoftenberg.

Mr Hoffenberg, through his long term contacts, as set forth below, believes he can assist
Mr. Epstein in resolving his existing disputes with the Federal government without any jail time
and to arrange for the sale of his financial business interests.

Governor Ben Barnes is prepared to meet with President Trump with respect to obtaining
an agreement with the Federal government.

Gary Baise, a Washington, D.C based attorney who has worked as senior attorney in the
Department of Justice, is working with us and will meet with the Department of Justice to obtain
an advantageous agreement in exchange for Mr. Epstein’s cooperation.

Lastly, Don Engel, who Mr. Epstein knows, who worked with Michael Milken at Drexel
Burnhan, will work with Goldman Sachs to take over Mr. Epstein’s business NOW.

We strongly believe that Mr. Epstein will benefit substantially from the foregoing and will
want to engage in mutually beneficial discussions.

I am attaching a draft of a Complaint which Mr. Baise will file through local counsel if we
cannot reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Please contact me at your earliest convenience.

Very truly yours,

The Mintz Fraade Lay Firm P.C

Alan P. Fraade

CC: TowersInvestors.com
APF/TSG
Encl. (1)
